input_data:
# SSL/TLS Configuration File - Apache HTTP Server
# /etc/httpd/conf.d/ssl.conf

# SSL Engine Configuration
SSLEngine on
SSLHonorCipherOrder on

# Certificate Configuration - RSA certificates (quantum vulnerable)
SSLCertificateFile /etc/ssl/certs/server-rsa-2048.crt
SSLCertificateKeyFile /etc/ssl/private/server-rsa-2048.key
SSLCertificateChainFile /etc/ssl/certs/intermediate-rsa.crt

# Legacy cipher suites - many quantum vulnerable
SSLCipherSuite ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-RC4-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:RC4-SHA:DES-CBC3-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!MD5:!PSK

# Protocol versions - includes vulnerable versions
SSLProtocol TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3

# Key exchange and signature algorithms
SSLOpenSSLConfCmd Curves secp256r1:secp384r1:secp521r1
SSLOpenSSLConfCmd SignatureAlgorithms RSA+SHA256:RSA+SHA384:RSA+SHA512:ECDSA+SHA256:ECDSA+SHA384:ECDSA+SHA512

# Session configuration
SSLSessionCache shmcb:/var/cache/mod_ssl/scache(512000)
SSLSessionCacheTimeout 300
SSLUseStapling on
SSLStaplingCache shmcb:/var/run/ocsp(128000)

# Vulnerable legacy support
SSLInsecureRenegotiation on
SSLCompression off

# Weak DH parameters
SSLOpenSSLConfCmd DHParameters /etc/ssl/dhparam-1024.pem

# Virtual Host Configuration
<VirtualHost *:443>
    ServerName vulnerable-bank.example.com
    DocumentRoot /var/www/html
    
    # RSA certificate (quantum vulnerable)
    SSLCertificateFile /etc/ssl/certs/bank-rsa-2048.crt
    SSLCertificateKeyFile /etc/ssl/private/bank-rsa-2048.key
    
    # Allow weak ciphers for legacy clients
    SSLCipherSuite HIGH:MEDIUM:!aNULL:!MD5:!RC4
    
    # HSTS header
    Header always set Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains"
    
    # Legacy authentication
    <Location "/legacy-auth">
        SSLCipherSuite RC4-SHA:DES-CBC3-SHA:AES128-SHA
        SSLVerifyClient require
        SSLCACertificateFile /etc/ssl/certs/legacy-ca-rsa.crt
    </Location>
</VirtualHost>

# Logging configuration
LogLevel warn ssl:info
ErrorLog logs/ssl_error_log
TransferLog logs/ssl_access_log
CustomLog logs/ssl_request_log "%t %h %{SSL_PROTOCOL}x %{SSL_CIPHER}x \"%r\" %b"

# Additional vulnerable configurations
SSLRandomSeed startup builtin
SSLRandomSeed connect builtin
SSLPassPhraseDialog builtin
SSLMutex default

# Korean cipher support (if available)
# SSLCipherSuite includes SEED-SHA:ARIA-GCM-SHA384 when Korean crypto modules loaded
description: Apache SSL configuration file with quantum-vulnerable RSA certificates, weak cipher suites, and legacy protocol support
expected_analysis_points: SSL/TLS configurations with quantum-vulnerable certificates and cipher suites
RSA certificate usage and weak key exchange parameters
legacy protocol versions and insecure cipher configurations
